department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 14, 2023 at 1400 EDT. All bids submitted after 1400 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base Winnipeg, has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) wireless six-post portable lift.
description: MODIFICATION DE L'HEURE DE CLŒTURE :  Veuillez ignorer l'heure de clôture de la date limite de réponse de la publication Ariba Discovery et l'heure de clôture de la publication AchatsCanada. Toutes les pièces justificatives requises et la soumission doivent être soumises au plus tard le mars 14, 2023, avant 1400 HAE. Toutes les soumissions soumises après 1400 HAE seront déclarées non conforme. . Le ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN), Base des Forces canadiennes Winnipeg, desire acheter et se faire livrer un (1) élévateur portatif à six colonnes.
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
===============

**Six-Post Portable Lift**

**Confidentiality Notice**
-------------------------

A contract award may result from this procurement. This posting is provided solely for information purposes. Interested suppliers should start with this notice when preparing their proposals.

**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) located in Winnipeg, Manitoba requires the supply and delivery of one (1) wireless six-post portable lift for use at Canadian Forces Base Winnipeg.

**Key Requirements and Terms**
----------------------------

*    **Supply and Delivery Period**: Delivery of the equipment must take place on or before February 28, 2024.
*    **Selection Criteria**: Evaluation will be conducted based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.
*    **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to suppliers from Canada and its partner countries with a reciprocal free trade agreement.
*    **Deliverables Location**: The equipment must be shipped to 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada.

**Tender Information**
----------------------

*    **Closing Date and Time**: All bids must be submitted electronically via Ariba Discovery or CanadaBuys by 1400 Eastern Daylight Time, March 14, 2023. Any bid submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive and omitted from evaluation.
*    **Government Tender Information**: Tender reference number WS3799246402, solicitation number WS3799246402.

**Important Timing Note**
------------------------

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All supporting documentation and bid submissions are due by March 14, 2023, 1400 EDT.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*    **Contact Name**: Oana Lee (SPAC/PSPC)
*    **Contact Email**: oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*    **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15443062?extsite=MTU0NDMwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15443062?extsite=MTU0NDMwNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
**procurement category**: Goods
**procurement method**: Competitive Open Bidding REQFORPROPN **procurement scope**: Tender reference number WS379924
